mapper.select: SELECT a.vctn_dtl_no ,a.vctn_stdt , a.vctn_endt , a.app_dt , a.vctn_used , b.emp_name , d.dept_name , c.vctn_nm FROM VCTN_HIS_TB A , EMP_TB B , VCTN_TYPE_TB C , DEPT_TB D WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND A.VCTN_CD = C.VCTN_CD AND B.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD order by a.vctn_dtl_no desc

SELECT B.EMP_NO ,E.VCTN_NO ,D.DEPT_NAME ,B.EMP_NAME ,TRUNC(MOD(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,B.HIRE_DATE)/12,0) ) Longevity ,E.ANNUAL ,E.REWARD FROM EMP_TB B , DEPT_TB D ,VCTN_TB E WHERE 1=1 AND B.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO ORDER by B.EMP_NO asc
SELECT SUM(A.VCTN_USED) VCTN_USED , A.EMP_NO , MAX(a.vctn_dtl_no) DTL_NO , A.VCTN_CD FROM VCTN_HIS_TB A GROUP BY a.vctn_cd, A.EMP_NO ORDER BY a.emp_no asc

SELECT A.EMP_NO ,B.VCTN_DTL_NO ,B.VCTN_STDT ,B.VCTN_ENDT ,A.USER_ID ,B.VCTN_REASON ,C.VCTN_NM ,c.VCTN_CD ,B.VCTN_USED FROM EMP_TB A ,VCTN_HIS_TB B ,VCTN_TYPE_TB C WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND A.EMP_NO=B.EMP_NO AND B.VCTN_CD=C.VCTN_CD ORDER BY B.VCTN_DTL_NO DESC

SELECT A.EMP_NO ,E.DEPT_NAME ,F.JOB_NAME ,A.EMP_NAME ,A.USER_ID ,B.ANNUAL ,B.REWARD ,D.VCTN_CD ,D.VCTN_NM ,C.VCTN_USED FROM EMP_TB A ,VCTN_TB B ,VCTN_HIS_TB C ,VCTN_TYPE_TB D ,DEPT_TB E ,JOB_TB F WHERE A.EMP_NO =#{empNo} AND A.EMP_NO=C.EMP_NO AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND C.VCTN_CD=D.VCTN_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND A.JOB_CD = F.JOB_CD
